name: cogitare

scripts.build: mkdir -p public/js && npm run css:build && npm run js:build && npm run serve:build
scripts.watch: mkdir -p public/js && run-p css:watch js:watch serve:watch
scripts.css:watch: nodemon -e css,json -w css -w package-lock.json -x 'npm run css:build'
scripts.js:build: browserify index.js -dt babelify -t package-json-versionify | exorcist public/js/index.js.map > public/js/index.js
scripts.js:watch: nodemon -e js,json -i public -i css -i node_modules -i serve -x 'npm run js:build'
scripts.serve:watch: nodemon -e js,json -i public -i css -i node_modules -i serve/render.js -x 'npm run serve:build; node serve'

browserlist: >1% in NZ, chrome 41, firefox esr, not ie <= 11
